nodes.text: The Central District was a district in New Adasta, the capital city of Ziost. In 3636 BBY the former Sith Emperor Vitiate came to the world and possessed many of the Imperials on the planet, turning them into his puppets to murder civilians and the Central District become a point of intense conflict before Vitiate wiped out all life on the planet.
Central District was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan in game update 3.2.
